name: dash-agent
description: AI Agent Task Dashboard - Monitor and manage autonomous AI agent tasks with real-time logs, diff viewer, and PR creation
author: Ezequiel Olivera

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && npm run dev:server & npm run dev:dashboard
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.bundle:win-x64: npm run build && npm run build:binary:win-x64 && node -e "const{cpSync}=require('fs');cpSync('packages/dashboard/dist','dist/win-x64/public',{recursive:true});cpSync('node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm','dist/win-x64/sql-wasm.wasm')" && echo Done: dist/win-x64/
scripts.bundle:linux-x64: npm run build && npm run build:binary:linux-x64 && node -e "const{cpSync}=require('fs');cpSync('packages/dashboard/dist','dist/linux-x64/public',{recursive:true});cpSync('node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm','dist/linux-x64/sql-wasm.wasm')" && echo Done: dist/linux-x64/
scripts.bundle:macos-x64: npm run build && npm run build:binary:macos-x64 && node -e "const{cpSync}=require('fs');cpSync('packages/dashboard/dist','dist/macos-x64/public',{recursive:true});cpSync('node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm','dist/macos-x64/sql-wasm.wasm')" && echo Done: dist/macos-x64/
scripts.bundle:macos-arm64: npm run build && npm run build:binary:macos-arm64 && node -e "const{cpSync}=require('fs');cpSync('packages/dashboard/dist','dist/macos-arm64/public',{recursive:true});cpSync('node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm','dist/macos-arm64/sql-wasm.wasm')" && echo Done: dist/macos-arm64/
